div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 31px; margin-left: 2px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular; color: #252525; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 31px; margin-left: 422px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular; color: #252525; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 118px; height: 1px; padding-top: 31px; margin-left: 762px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular; color: #252525; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 112px; margin-left: 272px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular; color: #595959; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
1. 可选：设备上报当前版本（MQTT协议）
/ota/device/inform/${YourProductKey}/${YourDeviceName}

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 150px; margin-left: 650px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular; color: #595959; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;

div.div: 2. 在控制台添加升级包，对设备发起OTA升级批次

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 192px; margin-left: 264px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular; color: #595959; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
3.1 下发升级包信息给设备（MQTT协议）
/ota/device/upgrade/${YourProductKey}/${YourDeviceName}

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 252px; margin-left: 249px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular; color: #595959; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;

div.div: 3.2 设备下载升级包（MQTT协议或HTTPS协议）

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 312px; margin-left: 264px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular; color: #595959; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
3.3 设备上报升级进度（MQTT协议）
/ota/device/progress/${YourProductKey}/${YourDeviceName}

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 353px; margin-left: 659px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular; color: #595959; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 393px; margin-left: 272px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular; color: #595959; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
3.5 设备端升级完成后，上报最新版本（MQTT协议）
/ota/device/inform/${YourProductKey}/${YourDeviceName}

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 433px; margin-left: 668px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: PingFangSC-Regular; color: #595959; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: none; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;
